org.mlc.swing.layout

Class ContainerLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mlc.swing.layout.ContainerLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2

    public class ContainerLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager2
    This class acts as a surrogate layout manager for the JGoodies (www.jgoodies.com) FormLayout manager. This layout manager enables us to associate names with components and then define the constraints for the component elsewhere (like xml)
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 8.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michael Connor
